item.title: James' Macaroni Cheese
item.description: This is my version of Macaroni Cheese. I don’t use macaroni if I can help it because it becomes too dense. Ingredients 350g dried pasta shapes (spirelli, fusilli etc.) 1 large onion 4 rashers of bacon 50g butter 50g plain flour 750ml semi-skimmed milk 1 stock cube 1 tsp Dijon mustard 150g mature Cheddar cheese 30g Parmesan cheese Handful of breadcrumbs Method Preheat the oven to 200℃ / gas mark 6.

item.title: Green Macaroni Cheese
item.description: This is Greens mac ‘n’ cheese from Jamie Oliver. Ingredients 1 large leek 3 cloves of garlic 400g broccoli 40g unsalted butter 1/2 a bunch of fresh thyme (15g) 2 tbsp plain flour 1 litre semi-skimmed milk 450g dried macaroni 30g Parmesan cheese 150g mature Cheddar cheese 100g baby spinach 50g flaked almonds Method Preheat the oven to 180℃ / gas mark 4. Cut the broccoli into florets and set aside, trim and finely slice the stalk.
